text:
Random HubSpotter floating by but when I worked at an agency migrating <http://oralb.com|oralb.com> from http to https that also happened and took a full year to resolve.

Not sure if this is a new site but for old sites:
1. External links may still point to non-ssl variants of your website
2. Wikipedia may reference your brand website url in http
3. You can submit your site to the hsts preload list
<https://hstspreload.org/>
